Naturally Effective: Formulated to quickly and effectively soothe a variety of common baby skin irritations diaper rash, chapped face, sunburn, chicken pox, bug bites and more
Dreamy Rosewood Scent: Enhance your baby's lines and clothing with a light, bright scent made with lemon and patchouli essential oils
No Harsh Chemicals: Grab Green's Baby Collection are made from naturally derived ingredients specially formulated to pamper our babies with no parabens, phthalates, or dyes

Safer for You, Your Family and the Planet: Grab Green's plant and mineral-based formulas ares made with responsibly-sourced, high-quality ingredients that are proudly cruelty-free, never tested on animals and made in the USA
body.description: Grab Green Baby Witch Hazel Soothing Wipes are specifically formulated to soothe a variety of common baby skin irritations such as diaper rash, chapped face, sunburn, chicken pox, bug bites and more. Our alcohol-free wipes are clinically-tested non-irritating, even for baby’s sensitive skin. Our Dreamy Rosewood scent is made with lemon and patchouli essential oils. The convenient compact resealable pouch is the perfect addition to any diaper bag. We responsibly source the highest quality plant and mineral-based ingredients and work directly with our team of organic chemists to create the most effective, naturally-derived, non-toxic formulas. Our thoughtful packaging includes clear use instructions and we believe in full ingredient disclosure—what we call True Transparency—which is why we list every ingredient and the purpose for each ingredient on every package. Grab Green is a female and mother owned and operated company that provides naturally derived and non-toxic laundry, home cleaning, and personal care products 100% made in the USA. Our products are eco-responsible and ensure safe and effective cleaning power for a healthy, happy home.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our philosophy simply! Cleaning is not only about what you remove, but what you add as well. As a mother of two daughters and two furry four-legged doggies, having a safe and healthy home was always Patricia Spencer’s top priority. She set out to craft Grab Green’s signature eco-responsible and family-safe formulas to not only do the job well, but offer a truly delightful experience. Trusted, go-to products. We’re all for that! Grab Green Baby Witch Hazel Soothing Solution More Than 99% Naturally-Derived & Alcohol Free Baby’s delicate skin is susceptible to a variety of skin irritations. We developed our Witch Hazel Solution to soothe and calm diaper rash, chapped face, sunburn, chicken pox, bug bites and more! Clinically-tested non-irritating. Made without alcohol, parabens, phthalates, dyes or masking agents. Dreamy Rosewood—contains essential oil lemon. Cruelty-free—we never test on animals. Made in the USA with domestic & imported components.

The Inevitable Diaper Rash The cleaner and drier baby’s bottom, the less likely it is to become irritated. Clean the diaper area during every diaper change, then allow the skin to dry completely before applying a diaper cream that contains moisture-blocking zinc oxide. Also, give baby some diaper-free time on a towel a few minutes every day. Avoid Skin Irritants • Steer clear of conventional dryer sheets and fabric softeners that are made with ingredients that leave a film on clothing. • Wash all new baby clothing, bedding, towels, etc. with a non-toxic detergent. • Steer clear of conventional shampoos and washes that contain phthalates, parabens and dyes. Fun, And Safe, In The Sun Newborn skin is highly susceptible to absorbing chemicals which can easily irritate skin, and sunscreens have chemicals aplenty. For babies 6 months and younger, choose wide-brimmed hats, long sleeves and pants. When necessary, choose a sunblock with zinc oxide or titanium dioxide.

Witch Hazel Wipes Shampoo/Lotion Kit, Rosewood Newborn Baby Laundry Kit Baby Laundry Kit Bottle & Dish Soap Diaper Pail Spray Natural Ingredients ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Non-Toxic Formulas ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Effective ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Cruelty-Free/No Animal Testing ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Free of Sulfates, Parabens, Phthalates & Dyes ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So great for soothing HFM rash
reviews.reviewText: I got these wipes for my baby because she was experiencing a tear but I didn’t end up using them for that purpose.This week our baby started showing symptoms for Hand Foot Mouth disease (as well as an ear infection). She has been screaming off and on for a few hours each day. When I dab these wipes on her arms and legs, she instantly seems to feel better and stops screaming. It’s day 4 of HFM and despite how miserable she is, these wipes have probably saved our sanity. I’m so happy these help her, especially now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not what I thought it was, after it reached my home.
reviews.reviewText: I was in the shampoo section looking for Baby Shampoo for Puppy safe products and this stuff popped up. So I bought it, but come to find out it's just a liquid with no cleansing properties at all. It's strictly for moisturizing dry skin for babies, bug bites and the lot.Not sure that its going to be safe for what I need. Totally neutral on this product, as I wasn't expecting anything from any body when I make a mistake, as I did here. The company out of the blue refunded my cost's associated with the order which surprised me, as it wasn't their mistake but mine.Outstanding Customer service like this is refreshing, and completely surprised me when it happened.I will donate the product to the local food bank in hopes it can find a home with someone with a small child that can benefit from this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soothing for irritated baby skin
reviews.reviewText: My daughter was soothed by this product, she was crying and fussing as soon as I wiped her down with these wipes, she stopped crying and relaxed. Other products that promised the same didn’t work for her! Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I was scared to use at first, but they seemed to soothe my baby that had a diaper rash!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soothes skin (not a cleanser). Lightly fragranced; leaves non-oily aloe, glycerin "film" on skin
reviews.reviewText: I use witch hazel for many different things, including as a facial toner and on my hands when they get an itchy rash. Without thinking, the first thing I did with this bottle was to put it all over my face. I was, to put it mildly, surprised when it left a bit of a film (not greasy or oily but not what I'd expected). That was my fault as I had not read the label, which clearly states that it is a "soothing solution" to be used for diaper rash, sunburn, chapped face, chicken pox, bug bites and more.Off and on, I have an itchy, dry rash on my hands (reaction to whatever is in our water), which only stings when any type of lotion, no matter how specialized for dry or itchy skin is used. I put some of this on and it did not sting. It also greatly diminished (and sometimes eliminated) the itching and drying.So although I can't use it on my face, as I thought I could, I CAN use it as a soothing lotion for abrasions; itchy dry patches; stings and the like.It comes in an 8-ounce size that although not small, is easy enough to carry around.I am highly allergic and super sensitive to fragrance. However the light fragrance on this is neither irritating on skin nor is it annoyingly odiforous.The residue that it leaves on your skin is not greasy and once it dries, it will not rub off on material.I like that this product seems to be free of a lot of skin-irritating ingredient.It has one of those little push tops, which means you can use one hand to open and dispense it.Overall, very good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I love Grab Green products, but...
reviews.reviewText: I'm not crazy about these wipes. I LOVE their laundry products and the other Grab Green products we've tried. These wipes just left a weird residue feeling, sort of sticky, and we don't like the scent at all. Makes me sad because I love this company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: These are like magic on my baby’s face rashes. They usually clear them up within an hour. Also helpful with diaper rash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smell good, does the job
reviews.reviewText: The wipes are nice in that they don’t drain the area you are cleaning of moisture. They smell pleasant as well!
